# Import

## Installation

```bash
npm install @tiptap-pro/extension-import-docx
```

## Usage

```js
import { ImportDocx } from '@tiptap-pro/extension-import-docx'

const editor = new Editor({
  extensions: [
    ImportDocx.configure({
      appId: 'your-tiptap-app-id',
      token: 'your-tiptap-auth-jwt',
      imageUploadCallbackUrl: 'https://you-image-upload-server.com/upload',
    }),
  ],
})

// import a file
editor
  .chain()
  .importDocx({
    file, // a File object
    onImport: ({ setEditorContent }) => {
      // handle loading state here
      setEditorContent() // set the content of the editor
    },
  })
  .run()
```
